titles.title: Sunset of the 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force Act
A bill to sunset the 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force after three years.
Sunset of the 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Sunset of the 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force Act
The Authorization for Use of Military Force (P.L. 107-40) terminates three years after the date of enactment of this Act, unless reauthorized.
